      • ExtntInfoSerialize

        public static byte[] ExtntInfoSerialize(ExtntInfo obj)
                                 throws IOException
        utility method to serialize ExtntInfo objects
        Parameters:
        obj - to serialize
        Returns:
        a byte array containing the object serialization
        Throws:
        IOException - shouldn't happen, since we are not doing actual IO, we are serializing into a memory buffer

      • ExtntInfoDeserialize

                                      throws IOException,
                                             ClassNotFoundException
        utility method to de-serialize a byte-array into a ExtntInfo object
        Parameters:
        bytes - the byte array containing the object's serialization
        Returns:
        the reconstructed object
        Throws:
        IOException - shouldn't happen, since we are not doing actual IO, we are de-serializing from a memory buf
        ClassNotFoundException

      • compareIncarnations

        public static int compareIncarnations(List<Integer> e1,
                                      List<Integer> e2)
        compare two incarnation values. Simply do a lexicographic comparison.
        Parameters:
        e1 -
        e2 -
        Returns:
        the result of the comparison, encoded as follows: 0: equal. -1: first parameter smaller than second. 1: first param greater than second.
